com.team254.lib.util.motion

Class HeadingProfileFollower

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.team254.lib.util.motion.ProfileFollower
      • com.team254.lib.util.motion.HeadingProfileFollower

  • public class HeadingProfileFollower
extends ProfileFollower
    Class to deal with angle wrapping for following a heading profile. All states are assumed to be in units of degrees, and wrap on the interval of [-180, 180].

    • Field Summary

      • canonicalize

        public static MotionState canonicalize(MotionState state)
        Convert a motion state representing an angle to a properly wrapped angle.

      • update

        public double update(MotionState latest_state,
                     double t)
        Description copied from class: ProfileFollower
        Update the setpoint and apply the control gains to generate a control output.
        Overrides:
        update in class ProfileFollower
        Parameters:
        latest_state - The latest *actual* state, used only for feedback purposes (unless this is the first iteration or reset()/resetSetpoint() was just called, in which case this is the new start state for the profile).
        t - The timestamp for which the setpoint is desired.
        Returns:
        An output that reflects the control output to apply to achieve the new setpoint.
